title: Surpassing Van der Poel: Can Pogačar Come Closer to the Monument Sweep at Milan-San Remo?
content:
Pogačar faces Van der Poel and pavé-shaped problems in his quest to be first since De Vlaeminck to claim victories across all five monuments.

Read the full article at Surpassing Van der Poel: Can Pogačar Come Closer to the Monument Sweep at Milan-San Remo? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
